pageTitle: Castelli Prologo 3 Men's Jersey | Competitive Cyclist
title: Men's Apparel
textBeforeTable: Castelli Size chart 30 days Manufacturer Warranty: road cycling Recommended Use: 3 rear, 1 rear zip Pockets: full-length Zip: slim Fit: [jersey] Stratus, [treatment] Prosecco Strada Material: Tech Specs The Castelli Prologo 3 Jersey is available in six sizes from Small to XXX-Large and in the colors Acid Green/black, Anthracite/white, Black/red, Black/yellow fluo, Ocean/white, Red/white, and White/black. Three rear pockets provide ample storage for your ride essentials, and reflective accents increases your visibility to motorists in low-light conditions. For ventilation, Castelli inserted a mesh panel across the the back of the jersey. You'll also find a full-length YKK zipper running the course of the front panel. So, with a quick zip, you can control your temperature on long climbs without overheating. Inset, raglan sleeves add to the comfort of the Prologo 3 jersey by providing a more anatomical fit. Additionally,
textAfterTable: How to Measure: For best results, take measurements over your underwear. Chest: Measure under your arms, around the fullest part of your chest. Waist: Measure around your natural waistline, keeping the tape a bit loose. Hip: Measure around the fullest part of your body at the top of your legs. Inseam: Using pants that fit well, measure the crotch seam to the bottom of the leg.
